text:
Clinical trials are taking place in many parts of the country. Information about clinical trials can be found in the Clinical Trials section of the NCI website. Check NCI's list of cancer clinical trials for ovarian cancer prevention trials that are now accepting patients.",CancerGov,"Ovarian, Fallopian Tube, and Primary Peritoneal Cancer"
What is (are) Laryngeal Cancer ?,"Key Points
                    - Laryngeal cancer is a disease in which malignant (cancer) cells form in the tissues
